statements.select: select b.ID as id, b.ISBN as isbn, b.NAME as name, a.name as author from BOOK b inner join AUTHOR a on a.ID = b.AUTHOR_ID where a.name in (:in:authors)
select b.ID as id, b.ISBN as isbn, b.NAME as name, a.name as author from BOOK b inner join AUTHOR a on a.ID = b.AUTHOR_ID where b.name like :name and a.name in (:in:authors)
